spell_tooltip.description: Your Power Word: Shield reduces all Physical damage taken by 15% while the shield persists.
Casting Mindbender increases your damage, and the damage of all allies with your Atonement by 10% for 8 sec.
15% of all damage you take is stored. The stored amount cannot exceed 12% of your maximum health. The initial damage of your next Shadow Word: Pain deals this stored damage to your target.
Fill the target with faith in the light, healing for 329,456 over 19 sec.

Summons a shadowy fiend to attack the target for 15 sec.

Generates 0.2% Mana each time the Shadowfiend attacks.
Places a ward on an ally that heals them for 56,859 the next time they take damage, and then jumps to another ally within 30 yds. Jumps up to 4 times and lasts 30 sec after each jump.
Increases healing done by Flash Heal by 15%.

A word of dark binding that inflicts 80,594 Shadow damage to your target. If your target is not killed by Shadow Word: Death, you take backlash damage equal to 5% of your maximum health.

Damage increased by 150% to targets below 20% health.
An explosion of holy light around you deals up to 45,676 Holy damage to enemies and up to 28,779 healing to allies within 13 yds, reduced if there are more than 5 targets.
Casting Flash Heal on yourself reduces all damage you take by 10% for 10 sec.

Places a feather at the target location, granting the first ally to walk through it 50% increased movement speed for 5 sec. When an ally walks through a feather, you are also granted 100% of its effect. Only 3 feathers can be placed at one time.
Activating Fade removes all snare effects.
After being struck by a melee or ranged critical hit, heal 20% of the damage taken over 6 sec.

Every 1 sec, the damage of your next Holy Nova is increased by 12% and its healing is increased by 20%. 

Stacks up to 20 times.
Pulls the spirit of a party or raid member, instantly moving them directly in front of you.
Summons shadowy tendrils, rooting all enemies within 8 yards for 15 sec or until the tendril is killed.
For 12 sec after casting Power Word: Shield, you deal 10% additional damage and healing with Smite and Holy Nova.
Dispels magic in a 15 yard radius, removing all harmful Magic from 5 friendly targets and 1 beneficial Magic effect from 5 enemy targets. Potent enough to remove Magic that is normally undispellable.

Infuses the target with power for 15 sec, increasing haste by 20%.

Can only be cast on players.
Reduces your target's physical damage taken by 5% for 15 sec after a critical heal with Flash Heal or Penance.
Power Word: Shield and Leap of Faith increase your target's movement speed by 40% for 3 sec.
Power Infusion also grants you its effect at 100% value when used on an ally. If no ally is targeted, it will grant its effect at 100% value to a nearby ally, preferring damage dealers.
When cast on yourself, 30% of damage you deal refills your Power Word: Shield.
While above 75% health, the cast time of your Flash Heal and Smite are reduced by 10%.
After damaging or healing a target below 35% health, gain 10% increased damage and healing for 8 sec.
Reduces the cooldown of Desperate Prayer by 20 sec.

Creates a ring of Holy energy around you that quickly expands to a 34 yd radius, healing allies for 152,950 and dealing 134,275 Holy damage to enemies.

Healing reduced beyond 6 targets.
Fade reduces damage you take by 10%.
Your healing spells and Smite have a 8% chance to make your next Flash Heal instant and cost no mana. Stacks to 2.
Reduces the cooldown of Fade by 10 sec.

A word of holy power that heals the target for 964,814. 

Only usable if the target is below 35% health.
Swap health percentages with your ally. Increases the lower health percentage of the two to 25% if below that amount.
Increases the range of most spells by 15%.

Power Word: Shield, Flash Heal, Renew, Power Word: Radiance, and Power Word: Life apply Atonement to your target for 15 sec.

Your spell damage heals all targets affected by Atonement for 28% of the damage done.

Healing increased by 125% when not in a raid.
A burst of light heals the target and 4 injured allies within 40 yards for 492,590, and applies Atonement for 60% of its normal duration.
Reduces all damage taken by a friendly target by 50% for 8 sec. Castable while stunned.
Shadow Word: Pain has a chance to empower your next Penance with Shadow, increasing its effectiveness by 30%.
Power Word: Radiance gains an additional charge.

Pain Suppression gains an additional charge.

Power Word: Shield reduces the cooldown of Pain Suppression by 3 sec.
Mind Blast has a 100% chance to grant Power of the Dark Side and its mana cost is reduced by 40%.
Mind Blast fractures the enemy's mind, increasing your spell damage to the target by 10% for 9 sec.
Reduces the cooldown of Power Word: Radiance by 3 sec.

Create a shield on all allies within 46 yards, absorbing 1 million damage on each of them for 10 sec.

Absorption decreased beyond 5 targets.
Each Penance bolt extends the duration of Shadow Word: Pain on enemies hit by 1.5 sec.
Shadow Word: Pain Spreads to 2 nearby enemies when you cast Penance on the target.
Extends Atonement on all allies by 6 sec and heals for 5.4 million, split evenly among them.
Casting Mindbender enters you into a shadowy pact, transforming Halo, Divine Star, and Penance into Shadow spells and increasing the damage and healing of your Shadow spells by 20% while active.
Shadow Word: Pain deals 5% additional damage and spreads to 1 additional target when you cast Penance to its target.
Smite extends the duration of an active Atonement by 3.0 sec.
Shadow Covenant increases Shadow spell damage and healing by an additional 10%.

Ascend into the air and unleash a massive barrage of Penance bolts, causing 3 million Holy damage to enemies or 7.2 million healing to allies over 4.9 sec.

While ascended, gain a shield for 100% of your health. In addition, you are unaffected by knockbacks or crowd control effects.
Atonement heals for 10% more when activated by Shadow spells.
Penance fires one additional bolt of holy light over its duration.
Atonement reduces damage taken by 2%.
Reduces the cooldown of Shadowfiend or Mindbender by 50%.
The damage of Smite and Penance is increased by 15%, and Penance increases or decreases your target's movement speed by 50% for 2 sec.
Power Word: Radiance causes your next Penance to fire 2 additional bolts, stacking up to 2 charges.

Penance, Mind Blast and Shadow Word: Death cause your Mindbender or Shadowfiend to teleport behind your target, slashing up to 5 nearby enemies for 110,146 Shadow damage and extending its duration by 0.7 sec.

Your Penance bolts increase the damage of your next Smite by 20%, or the absorb of your next Power Word: Shield by 5%.

Stacks up to 8 times.

Summons a Mindbender to attack the target for 12 sec. 

Generates 0.2% Mana each time the Mindbender attacks.

Gain access to a spell that gives you an advantage against your fate.  Premonition rotates to the next spell when cast.

 Premonition of Insight
Reduces the cooldown of your next 3 spell casts by 9.8 sec.

 Premonition of Piety
Increases your healing done by 28% and causes 98% of overhealing on players to be redistributed to up to 4 nearby allies for 15 sec. 

 Premonition of Solace
Your next single target healing spell grants your target a shield that absorbs 3.1 million damage and reduces their damage taken by 21% for 15 sec.

Power Word: Shield absorbs 40% additional damage.

All damage dealt by Penance, Smite and Holy Nova increased by 20%.
Increases the duration of Atonement and Renew by 4 sec.
Premonition causes your next Power Word: Radiance cast to be instant and cost 15% less mana.
Power Word: Shield casts apply 4 stacks of Prayer of Mending to your target.

Your Angelic Feathers increase movement speed by an additional 10%.

When an ally walks through your Angelic Feather, you are also granted 100% of its effect.
Pain Suppression reduces damage taken by an additional 10%.
Your Flash Heal and Power Word: Shield are 30% more effective when cast on yourself.
3 additional Penance bolts are fired at an enemy within 46 yards when healing an ally with Penance, or fired at an ally within 46 yards when damaging an enemy with Penance.
Increases the effects of Premonition by 40%.

Casting Premonition of Solace invokes Clairvoyance, expanding your mind and opening up all possibilities of the future.

 Premonition of Clairvoyance
Grants Premonition of Insight, Piety, and Solace at 100% effectiveness.
Fill the target with faith in the light, healing for 329,456 over 19 sec.

Summons a shadowy fiend to attack the target for 15 sec.

Generates 0.2% Mana each time the Shadowfiend attacks.
Places a ward on an ally that heals them for 57,518 the next time they take damage, and then jumps to another ally within 30 yds. Jumps up to 4 times and lasts 30 sec after each jump.
Increases healing done by Flash Heal by 15%.

A word of dark binding that inflicts 78,264 Shadow damage to your target. If your target is not killed by Shadow Word: Death, you take backlash damage equal to 5% of your maximum health.

Damage increased by 150% to targets below 20% health.
An explosion of holy light around you deals up to 45,839 Holy damage to enemies and up to 29,707 healing to allies within 13 yds, reduced if there are more than 5 targets.
Casting Flash Heal on yourself reduces all damage you take by 10% for 10 sec.

Places a feather at the target location, granting the first ally to walk through it 50% increased movement speed for 5 sec. When an ally walks through a feather, you are also granted 100% of its effect. Only 3 feathers can be placed at one time.
If your Shadow Word: Death fails to kill a target at or below 20% health, its cooldown is reset. Cannot occur more than once every 10 sec.
Reduces all magic damage taken by 3%.

Every 1 sec, the damage of your next Holy Nova is increased by 12% and its healing is increased by 20%. 

Stacks up to 20 times.
Pulls the spirit of a party or raid member, instantly moving them directly in front of you.

Controls a mind up to 1 level above yours for 30 sec while still controlling your own mind. Does not work versus Demonic, Mechanical, or Undead beings or players. This spell shares diminishing returns with other disorienting effects.
For 12 sec after casting Power Word: Shield, you deal 10% additional damage and healing with Smite and Holy Nova.
Dispels magic in a 15 yard radius, removing all harmful Magic from 5 friendly targets and 1 beneficial Magic effect from 5 enemy targets. Potent enough to remove Magic that is normally undispellable.

Infuses the target with power for 15 sec, increasing haste by 20%.

Can only be cast on players.
Reduces your target's physical damage taken by 5% for 15 sec after a critical heal with Flash Heal or Penance.
Power Word: Shield and Leap of Faith increase your target's movement speed by 40% for 3 sec.
Power Infusion also grants you its effect at 100% value when used on an ally. If no ally is targeted, it will grant its effect at 100% value to a nearby ally, preferring damage dealers.
When cast on yourself, 30% of damage you deal refills your Power Word: Shield.
While above 75% health, the cast time of your Flash Heal and Smite are reduced by 10%.
After damaging or healing a target below 35% health, gain 10% increased damage and healing for 8 sec.
20% of Flash Heal healing on other targets also heals you.

Creates a ring of Holy energy around you that quickly expands to a 34 yd radius, healing allies for 152,103 and dealing 134,860 Holy damage to enemies.

Healing reduced beyond 6 targets.
Fade reduces damage you take by 10%.
Your healing spells and Smite have a 8% chance to make your next Flash Heal instant and cost no mana. Stacks to 2.
Reduces the cooldown of Fade by 10 sec.

A word of holy power that heals the target for 971,498. 

Only usable if the target is below 35% health.

Attacks from your Shadowfiend siphon life from enemies, healing a nearby injured ally for 167,926.

Attacks from your Mindbender siphon life from enemies, healing a nearby injured ally for 55,975.
Increases the range of most spells by 15%.

Power Word: Shield, Flash Heal, Renew, Power Word: Radiance, and Power Word: Life apply Atonement to your target for 15 sec.

Your spell damage heals all targets affected by Atonement for 28% of the damage done.

Healing increased by 125% when not in a raid.
A burst of light heals the target and 4 injured allies within 40 yards for 499,305, and applies Atonement for 60% of its normal duration.
Reduces all damage taken by a friendly target by 50% for 8 sec. Castable while stunned.
Shadow Word: Pain has a chance to empower your next Penance with Shadow, increasing its effectiveness by 30%.
Power Word: Radiance gains an additional charge.

Pain Suppression gains an additional charge.

Power Word: Shield reduces the cooldown of Pain Suppression by 3 sec.

Places a ward on an ally that heals them for 55,721 the next time they take damage, and then jumps to another ally within 30 yds. Jumps up to 4 times and lasts 30 sec after each jump.
Increases healing done by Flash Heal by 15%.
Purify additionally removes all Disease effects.
Prayer of Mending does 45% increased healing to the initial target.
An explosion of holy light around you deals up to 46,282 Holy damage to enemies and up to 28,694 healing to allies within 13 yds, reduced if there are more than 5 targets.
Casting Flash Heal on yourself reduces all damage you take by 10% for 10 sec.

Places a feather at the target location, granting the first ally to walk through it 50% increased movement speed for 5 sec. When an ally walks through a feather, you are also granted 100% of its effect. Only 3 feathers can be placed at one time.
Reduces all magic damage taken by 3%.

Every 1 sec, the damage of your next Holy Nova is increased by 12% and its healing is increased by 20%. 

Stacks up to 20 times.
Pulls the spirit of a party or raid member, instantly moving them directly in front of you.
Dispels magic in a 15 yard radius, removing all harmful Magic from 5 friendly targets and 1 beneficial Magic effect from 5 enemy targets. Potent enough to remove Magic that is normally undispellable.

Infuses the target with power for 15 sec, increasing haste by 20%.

Can only be cast on players.
Reduces your target's physical damage taken by 5% for 15 sec after a critical heal with Flash Heal or Penance.
Reduces the mana cost of Purify and Mass Dispel by 50% and Dispel Magic by 10%.
Power Word: Shield and Leap of Faith increase your target's movement speed by 40% for 3 sec.
Power Infusion also grants you its effect at 100% value when used on an ally. If no ally is targeted, it will grant its effect at 100% value to a nearby ally, preferring damage dealers.
While above 75% health, the cast time of your Flash Heal and Smite are reduced by 10%.
After damaging or healing a target below 35% health, gain 10% increased damage and healing for 8 sec.
20% of Flash Heal healing on other targets also heals you.

Creates a ring of Holy energy around you that quickly expands to a 34 yd radius, healing allies for 150,155 and dealing 134,062 Holy damage to enemies.

Healing reduced beyond 6 targets.
Fade reduces damage you take by 10%.
Your healing spells and Smite have a 8% chance to make your next Flash Heal instant and cost no mana. Stacks to 2.
Increases the maximum health gained from Desperate Prayer by 15%.
Reduces the cooldown of Fade by 10 sec.
Increases the healing of your spells by 3%.
When an attack brings you below 30% health, you gain an absorption shield equal to 15% of your maximum health for 20 sec. Cannot occur more than once every 90 sec.
Increases the range of most spells by 15%.
Perform a miracle, healing an ally for 1.5 million.

Releases miraculous light at a target location, healing up to 5 allies within 10 yds for 415,227.

Cooldown reduced by 6 sec when you cast Prayer of Healing and by 2 sec when you cast Renew.

Calls upon a guardian spirit to watch over the friendly target for 12 sec, increasing healing received by 60%. If the target would die, the Spirit sacrifices itself and restores the target to 40% health.

Castable while stunned. Cannot save the target from massive damage.
A powerful prayer that heals the target and the 4 nearest allies within 40 yards for 306,894.

When Guardian Spirit saves the target from death, it does not expire.

When Guardian Spirit expires without saving the target from death, reduce its remaining cooldown to 60 seconds.
Holy Word: Sanctify reduces the cast time and cost of your Prayer of Healing by 20% for 8 sec.
When Holy Word: Serenity or Holy Word: Sanctify finish their cooldown, you emit a burst of light that heals up to 5 injured targets within 46 yards for 114,691.

Prayer of Mending and Power Word: Life reduce the cooldown of Holy Word: Serenity by 4 sec.

Halo and Divine Star reduce the cooldown of Holy Word: Sanctify by 4 sec.

Holy Fire reduces the cooldown of Holy Word: Chastise by 4 sec.
Heal restores up to 15% additional health, based on your missing mana.

Heals all party or raid members within 46 yards for 1.2 million over 4.0 sec. Each heal increases all targets' healing taken by 4% for 15 sec, stacking.

Healing reduced beyond 5 targets.
Your Prayer of Mending has a 12% chance to leave a Renew on each target it heals.
Your healing on allies with your Renew is increased by 10%.
Reduces the cooldown of Divine Hymn by 60 sec.
Prayer of Mending heals 4% more for each bounce remaining.
Increases the critical strike chance of Heal, Flash Heal, and Power Word: Life by 15%.
Reset the cooldown of your Holy Words, and enter a pure Holy form for 20 sec, increasing the cooldown reductions to your Holy Words by 200% and reducing their cost by 100%.
Prayer of Mending jumps 2 additional times.
Dispels Magic on the enemy target, removing 1 beneficial Magic effect.

Summons a shadowy fiend to attack the target for 15 sec.

Generates 0.2% Mana each time the Shadowfiend attacks.
Increases healing done by Flash Heal by 15%.
Reduces the cooldown of Psychic Scream by 15 sec.

A word of dark binding that inflicts 79,477 Shadow damage to your target. If your target is not killed by Shadow Word: Death, you take backlash damage equal to 5% of your maximum health.

Damage increased by 150% to targets below 20% health.
An explosion of holy light around you deals up to 46,150 Holy damage to enemies and up to 29,908 healing to allies within 13 yds, reduced if there are more than 5 targets.
Casting Flash Heal on yourself reduces all damage you take by 10% for 10 sec.

Places a feather at the target location, granting the first ally to walk through it 50% increased movement speed for 5 sec. When an ally walks through a feather, you are also granted 100% of its effect. Only 3 feathers can be placed at one time.
If your Shadow Word: Death fails to kill a target at or below 20% health, its cooldown is reset. Cannot occur more than once every 10 sec.
Reduces all magic damage taken by 3%.
Pulls the spirit of a party or raid member, instantly moving them directly in front of you.
Increases the amount of damage required to break your Psychic Scream by 75%.

Controls a mind up to 1 level above yours for 30 sec while still controlling your own mind. Does not work versus Demonic, Mechanical, or Undead beings or players. This spell shares diminishing returns with other disorienting effects.
Dispels magic in a 15 yard radius, removing all harmful Magic from 5 friendly targets and 1 beneficial Magic effect from 5 enemy targets. Potent enough to remove Magic that is normally undispellable.

Infuses the target with power for 15 sec, increasing haste by 20%.

Can only be cast on players.
Fills you with the embrace of Shadow energy for 12 sec, causing you to heal a nearby ally for 40% of any single-target Shadow spell damage you deal.
Power Word: Shield and Leap of Faith increase your target's movement speed by 40% for 3 sec.
Power Infusion also grants you its effect at 100% value when used on an ally. If no ally is targeted, it will grant its effect at 100% value to a nearby ally, preferring damage dealers.

Sanguine Teachings
Sanguine Teachings grants an additional 2% Leech.

 Vampiric Embrace
Reduces the cooldown of Vampiric Embrace by 30 sec, increases its healing done by 25%.
After damaging or healing a target below 35% health, gain 10% increased damage and healing for 8 sec.
Shadow Word: Pain deals an additional 5% damage. When an enemy dies while afflicted by your Shadow Word: Pain, you gain 1.0% Mana.
Creates a ring of Shadow energy around you that quickly expands to a 34 yd radius, healing allies for 148,381 and dealing 135,411 Shadow damage to enemies. Healing reduced beyond 6 targets.
When your Shadow Word: Pain expires or is refreshed with less than 5 sec remaining, a nearby ally within 46 yards is healed for 229,306.
Increases the maximum health gained from Desperate Prayer by 15%.
Reduces the cooldown of Fade by 10 sec.
You take 2% less damage from enemies affected by your Shadow Word: Pain.
When an attack brings you below 30% health, you gain an absorption shield equal to 15% of your maximum health for 20 sec. Cannot occur more than once every 90 sec.

Attacks from your Shadowfiend siphon life from enemies, healing a nearby injured ally for 167,926.

Attacks from your Mindbender siphon life from enemies, healing a nearby injured ally for 55,975.
Increases the range of most spells by 15%.

Afflicts the target with a disease that instantly causes 194,474 Shadow damage plus an additional 228,340 Shadow damage over 6 sec. Heals you for 30% of damage dealt.

If this effect is reapplied, any remaining damage will be added to the new Devouring Plague.

Disperse into pure shadow energy, reducing all damage taken by 75% for 6 sec and healing you for 25% of your maximum health over its duration, but you are unable to attack or cast spells.

Increases movement speed by 50% and makes you immune to all movement impairing effects.

Castable while stunned, feared, or silenced.

Mind Blast, Devouring Plague, and Void Bolt conjure Shadowy Apparitions that float towards all targets afflicted by your Vampiric Touch for 27,627 Shadow damage. 

Critical strikes increase the damage by 100%.
Silences the target, preventing them from casting spells for 4 sec. Against non-players, also interrupts spellcasting and prevents any spell in that school from being cast for 4 sec.
Healing from Vampiric Touch and Devouring Plague when you are at maximum health will shield you for the same amount. The shield cannot exceed 10% of your maximum health.
Vampiric Touch also applies Shadow Word: Pain to the target. Shadow Word: Pain lasts an additional 5 sec.
Mind Blast gains an additional charge.

Your direct damage spells inflict 35% of their damage on all other targets afflicted by your Vampiric Touch within 46 yards.

Does not apply to damage from Shadowy Apparitions, Shadow Word: Pain, and Vampiric Touch.

Every 2 casts of Devouring Plague transforms your next Mind Flay or Mind Spike into a more powerful spell. Can accumulate up to 4 charges.

 Mind Flay: Insanity
Assaults the target's mind with Shadow energy, causing 465,965 Shadow damage over 1.2 sec and slowing their movement speed by 70%.

Generates 12 Insanity over the duration.

Mind Spike: Insanity
Blasts the target for 322,708 Shadowfrost damage.

Generates 12 Insanity.

Hurl a bolt of slow-moving Shadow energy at your target, dealing 63,241 Shadow damage to all enemies within 8 yds.

Generates 6 Insanity.

This spell is cast at your target.

Increases your non-periodic Shadow damage by 20% for 20 sec.

Generates 30 Insanity.

Increases the damage of Mind Flay and Mind Spike by 10%.

The duration of your Shadow Word: Pain and Vampiric Touch is increased by 1 sec when enemies suffer damage from Mind Flay and 2 sec when enemies suffer damage from Mind Spike.
Shadow Crash applies Vampiric Touch to up to 8 targets it damages.
Shadow Word: Pain periodic damage has a chance to reset the remaining cooldown on Mind Blast and cause your next Mind Blast to be instant.
Voidform and Dark Ascension increase the critical strike chance of your spells by 10% for 20 sec, reducing by 0.5% every sec.
Increases your Devouring Plague damage by 6% and increases your maximum Insanity by 50.
Your Mind Flay, Mind Spike, and Void Torrent damage increase the damage of your periodic Shadow effects by 2%, stacking up to 5 times.
Mind Blast has a 5% chance to make your next Devouring Plague cost no Insanity and deal 20% additional damage.
Reduces the Insanity cost of Devouring Plague by 5.
Your Shadow Word: Pain damage has a chance to reset the cooldown of Shadow Word: Death, increase its damage by 25%, and deal damage as if striking a target below 20% health.
Your Shadowy Apparitions deal 15% increased damage and have a chance to generate 1 Insanity.

Channel a torrent of void energy into the target, dealing 995,175 Shadow damage over 3 sec.

Generates 24 Insanity over the duration.
Increases the critical strike chance of Mind Blast, Mind Spike, Mind Flay, and Shadow Word: Death by 8% and increases their critical strike damage by 40%.
Devouring Plague causes your Shadow Word: Pain and Vampiric Touch to deal damage 40% faster on all targets for 3 sec.
While you have Shadow Word: Pain, Devouring Plague, and Vampiric Touch active on the same target, your Mind Blast and Void Torrent deal 40% more damage.

Your periodic Shadow Word: Pain and Vampiric Touch damage has a 30% chance to apply Echoing Void, max 4 targets.

Each time Echoing Void is applied, it has a chance to collapse, consuming a stack every 1 sec to deal 11,184 Shadow damage to all nearby enemies. Damage reduced beyond 5 targets.

If an enemy dies with Echoing Void, all stacks collapse immediately.

Mind Flay, Mind Spike, and Void Torrent have a chance to spawn a Void Tendril that channels Mind Flay or Void Lasher that channels Mind Sear at your target.

 Mind Flay
Assaults the target's mind with Shadow energy, causing 303,010 Shadow damage over 15 sec and slowing their movement speed by 30%.

Generates 10 Insanity over the duration.

Mind Sear
Corrosive shadow energy radiates from the target, dealing 156,952 Shadow damage over 15 sec to all enemies within 10 yards of the target. Damage reduced beyond 5 targets.

Generates 10 Insanity over the duration.
Your damage dealt is increased by 12% while Dark Ascension is active and by 20% while Voidform is active.
Allies healed by your Halo receive 2% increased healing from you for 8 sec, stacking up to 5 times.
Creating a Halo grants Surge of Light.
Halo damage reduces enemy movement speed by 5% for 5 sec, stacking up to 5 times.
Power Word: Fortitude grants you an additional 5% stamina.
Increases the healing done by Flash Heals affected by Surge of Light by 30%.
Halo damage and healing is increased by 30%.
Your Power Infusion effect grants you an additional 10% haste.
Consuming Surge of Insanity has a 100% chance to conjure Shadowy Apparitions.
Halo now centers around you and returns to you after it reaches its maximum distance, healing allies and damaging enemies each time it passes through them.
